items.title: BBC News app

items.title: Hackers say they have deleted children's pictures and data after nursery attack backlash
items.summary: The hackers tell the BBC they are sorry for their actions - but experts say it's a practical rather than moral move.

items.title: Why BBC sent undercover reporter into a busy London police station

items.title: Taliban ‘Foreign Minister’ Muttaqi to visit India next week

items.summary: Khandwa Collector Rishav Gupta said the locals and a home guard posted near the immersion site had warned the tractor driver against going ahead but he did not listen, and the tractor plunged into water after losing control.
